synonyms: jagannātha miśra-vara—Jagannātha Miśra, who was the chief among the seven; padavī—designation; purandara—another name of Vasudeva; nanda—Nanda, the father of Kṛṣṇa; vasudeva—the father of Kṛṣṇa; rūpa—like; sat-guṇa—good qualities; sāgara—ocean.
translation: Jagannātha Miśra was designated as Purandara. Exactly like Nanda Mahārāja and Vasudeva, he was an ocean of all good qualities.
